TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IdnMapping extends System.Object

summary.span: Supports the use of non-ASCII characters for Internet domain names.

span.span: Supports the use of non-ASCII characters for Internet domain names.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網際網路網域名稱是由一或多個部分，稱為標籤分隔符號所分隔的網域名稱標籤所組成。An Internet domain name consists of one or more parts, called domain name labels, separated by label separators. 例如，網域名稱 」 www.proseware.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"proseware，」 和 「 com 」，以句號分隔。For example, the domain name "www.proseware.com" consists of the labels, "www", "proseware", and "com", separated by periods. 標準的網域名稱包含在 US ASCII （或基本拉丁文） 字元範圍中，從 U + 0021 U + 007E 至指定的字元。Standard domain names consist of designated characters in the US-ASCII (or Basic Latin) character range, from U+0021 to U+007E. 為了在不使用 US-ASCII 字元組，國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA) 的文化特性的網際網路使用量 2003 以支援包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外的 Unicode 字元的採用標準。To facilitate Internet usage in cultures that do not use the US-ASCII character set, the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) standard was adopted in 2003 to support the inclusion of Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range. 不過，名稱伺服器和網域名稱解析繼續依賴 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的字元。However, name servers and domain name resolution continue to rely on characters within the US-ASCII character range. IDNA 機制會使用 Punycode 對應國際化的網域名稱包含網域名稱系統所支援的 US-ASCII 字元範圍以 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外的 Unicode 字元。The IDNA mechanism uses Punycode to map an internationalized domain name that contains Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to the US-ASCII character range supported by the domain name system. IDNA 機制用來轉換僅網域名稱，不透過網際網路傳輸的資料。The IDNA mechanism is used to convert only domain names, not data transmitted over the Internet. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統：In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use: > > - 在上執行時[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支援 2008年版的所述的 IDNA 標準[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). > - 舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行時，它支援 2003年版本的所述的標準[RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110). > > 請參閱[Unicode 的技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)的方式有些差異這些標準處理特定字元集。See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters. 方法正規化的網域名稱，將標準化的名稱轉換成在 US-ASCII 字碼指標範圍 (U + 0020 到 U + 007E)，可顯示 Unicode 字元所組成，前面加上 ASCII 相容編碼 (ACE) 前置詞的表示法 ("y2...xn-") 給每一個標籤。The method normalizes a domain name, converts the normalized name to a representation that consists of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII code point range (U+0020 to U+007E), and prepends an ASCII-compatible encoding (ACE) prefix ("xn--") to each label. 方法還原轉換的網域名稱標籤方法。The method restores the domain name labels converted by the method. 如果要轉換的字串包含標籤分隔符號字元表意完全停止 (U + 3002)，設為全形完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意完全停止 (U + FF61)方法將它們轉換成標籤分隔符號完全停止 （句號，U +002E)。If the string to be converted includes the label separator characters IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61), the method converts them to the label separator FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 方法，不過，不會還原原始標籤分隔字元。The method, however, does not restore the original label separator character. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換的陣列國際化網域名稱，為 Punycode。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode. 方法，然後將的 Punycode 網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back to the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/cs/conversion1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/vb/conversion1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公用方法是安全執行緒，且可能會同時使用多個執行緒，只要從執行個體的屬性不也同時設定。

span.span: All public methods of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, as long as the instance's properties are not also set concurrently.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性會初始化為`false`。The and properties are initialized to `false`. 一小部分的 ASCII 字元 A-Z、 0-9、 連字號 （-） 以外的字元 (U + 002D)，和網域名稱中允許的句號 （.） 字元，但不是未指定的 Unicode 字碼指標。A small subset of ASCII characters other than A-Z, 0-9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character are permitted in domain names, but unassigned Unicode code points are not.

public: property bool AllowUnassigned { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unassigned Unicode code points are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unassigned Unicode code points are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

value.span: 如果未指定的字碼指標作業中所使用;否則， 。

span.span: if unassigned code points are used in operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已註冊的網域名稱不能包含未指派的字碼指標。A registered domain name cannot contain unassigned code points. 因此，預設值的屬性是`false`。Consequently, the default value of the property is `false`. IDNA 規格允許只在查詢進行比對字串中未指定的字碼指標 (也就是在網域名稱查閱)。The IDNA specification permits unassigned code points only in queries for matching strings (that is, in domain name lookup). 如需有關使用網域名稱中未指定的字碼指標，請參閱[RFC 3454、 「 準備的國際化字串 (stringprep) 」](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873)和[RFC 5891、"國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 （IDNA): 通訊協定 」](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。For more information about the use of unassigned code points in domain names, see [RFC 3454, "Preparation of Internationalized Strings (stringprep)"](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) and [RFC 5891, "Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol"](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果屬性是`false`，與屬性相關聯的行為取決於基礎作業系統。If the property is `false`, the behavior associated with the property depends on the underlying operating system. 在[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]、類別符合 IDNA 2008，Unicode 6.0 標準為基礎。On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], the class conforms to IDNA 2008, which is based on the Unicode 6.0 standard. 在舊版的 Windows，類別根據 IDNA 2003，以 Unicode 3 為基礎。*x*。On previous versions of Windows, the class is based on IDNA 2003, which is based on Unicode 3.*x*. IDNA 2008 中支援和字元已指派給已指派 IDNA 2003 中的一些字碼指標。Some code points that were unassigned in IDNA 2003 have been assigned characters and are supported in IDNA 2008. 例如，U + 0221年中引進了 Unicode 4.0。For example, U+0221 was introduced in Unicode 4.0. 在[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，編碼為"y2...xn — 6la"。On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it is encoded as "xn—6la". 舊版 Windows 中，它會擲回例外狀況。On previous versions of Windows, it throws an exception.

summary.span: Encodes a string of domain name labels that consist of Unicode characters to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range.

returns.span: The equivalent of the string specified by the parameter, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

span.span: The equivalent of the string specified by the parameter, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unicode`參數指定有效的 Unicode 字元所組成的一或多個標籤的字串。The `unicode` parameter specifies a string of one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 標籤會以分隔符號標籤分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. `unicode`參數開頭不可以為標籤分隔符號，但它可以包括以及選擇性地以分隔符號結束。The `unicode` parameter cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，設為全形完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意完全停止 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，網域名稱 」 www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，」 和 「 com 」，以句號分隔。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 從 U + 001f 範圍和 U + 007F 到 U + 0001 Unicode 控制字元。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 如果未指定 Unicode 字元的值屬性是`false`。Unassigned Unicode characters, if the value of the property is `false`. - 非標準字元 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空格 (U + 0020) 中驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，和低 (U + 005F) 字元，如果值屬性是`true`。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, if the value of the property is `true`. - 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 如需禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果`unicode`未包含任何外部 US-ASCII 字元會禁止的字元範圍和 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回`unicode`不變。If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換的陣列國際化網域名稱，為 Punycode，這是包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍中的字元的編碼對等用法。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 方法再轉換回原始的網域名稱的 Punycode 網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/cs/conversion1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/vb/conversion1.vb#1)]

span.span: is invalid based on the and properties, and the IDNA standard.

span.para: 在 [！INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統:-在上執行時 [！它支援 2008年版的所述的 IDNA 標準 INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。 -當在舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行，它會支援 2003年版本的所述的標準 [RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。請參閱 [Unicode 的技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)的方式有些差異這些標準處理特定字元集。

In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110). See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

span.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unicode`和`index`參數定義具有有效的 Unicode 字元所組成的一或多個標籤的子字串。The `unicode` and `index` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 標籤會以分隔符號標籤分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. 子字串的第一個字元不能以標籤分隔字元開頭，但它可以包括以及選擇性地以分隔符號結束。The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，設為全形完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意完全停止 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，網域名稱 」 www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，」 和 「 com 」，以句號分隔。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 從 U + 001f 範圍和 U + 007F 到 U + 0001 Unicode 控制字元。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未指派的值而定的 Unicode 字元，屬性。Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the property. - 非標準字元 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空格 (U + 0020) 中驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，和低列 (U + 005F) 字元，根據的值屬性。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the property. - 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 如需禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果`unicode`未包含任何外部 US-ASCII 字元會禁止的字元範圍和 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回`unicode`不變。If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged. ## Examples 下列範例會移除本機的組件和 @ 字元從電子郵件地址，並傳遞產生的網域名稱，以方法來建立一個包含 US-ASCII 字元編碼對等的 Punycode 網域名稱字元範圍。The following example removes the local part and the @ character from an email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the method to create a Punycode domain name, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 方法再轉換回原始的網域名稱的 Punycode 網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/cs/conversion1a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/vb/conversion1a.vb#2)]

span.span: is invalid based on the and properties, and the IDNA standard.

span.para: 在 [！INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統:-在上執行時 [！它支援 2008年版的所述的 IDNA 標準 INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。 -當在舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行，它會支援 2003年版本的所述的標準 [RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。請參閱 [Unicode 的技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)的方式有些差異這些標準處理特定字元集。

In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110). See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode, int index, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode, int32 index, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String, index As Integer, count As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode, int index, int count);
member this.GetAscii : string * int * int -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

param.name: index
param.span: A zero-based offset into unicode that specifies the start of the substring.

span.span: A zero-based offset into unicode that specifies the start of the substring.

param.name: count
param.span: The number of characters to convert in the substring that starts at the position specified by index in the unicode string.

span.span: The number of characters to convert in the substring that starts at the position specified by index in the unicode string.

summary.span: Encodes the specified number of characters in a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.

span.span: Encodes the specified number of characters in a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

span.span: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the , , and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

span.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the , , and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Unicode`， `index`，和`count`參數定義具有有效的 Unicode 字元所組成的一或多個標籤的子字串。The `Unicode`, `index`, and `count` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 標籤會以分隔符號標籤分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. 子字串的第一個字元不能以標籤分隔字元開頭，但它可以包括以及選擇性地以分隔符號結束。The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，設為全形完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意完全停止 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，網域名稱 」 www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，」 和 「 com 」，以句號分隔。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 從 U + 001f 範圍和 U + 007F 到 U + 0001 Unicode 控制字元。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未指派的值而定的 Unicode 字元，屬性。Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the property. - 非標準字元 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空格 (U + 0020) 中驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，和低列 (U + 005F) 字元，根據的值屬性。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the property. - 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 如需禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果子字串未包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍，以外的任何字元，而且禁止使用 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回未變更的子字串。If the substring contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range, and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns the substring unchanged. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換符合 IDNA 標準的網域名稱使用國際化的網域名稱。The following example uses the method to convert an internationalized domain name to a domain name that complies with the IDNA standard. 方法，然後將標準化的網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the standardized domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[IdnMapping.GetX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IdnMapping.GetX/CS/getx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IdnMapping.GetX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IdnMapping.GetX/VB/getx.vb#1)]

span.para: 在 [！INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統:-在上執行時 [！它支援 2008年版的所述的 IDNA 標準 INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。 -當在舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行，它會支援 2003年版本的所述的標準 [RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。請參閱 [Unicode 的技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理] (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)的方式有些差異這些標準處理特定字元集。

In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110). See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

summary.span: Returns a hash code for this object.

span.span: Returns a hash code for this object.

returns.span: One of four 32-bit signed constants derived from the properties of an object.

span.span: One of four 32-bit signed constants derived from the properties of an object.

returns.span: The return value has no special meaning and is not suitable for use in a hash code algorithm.

span.span: The return value has no special meaning and is not suitable for use in a hash code algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，如果您的應用程式必須實作的有意義的雜湊程式碼的演算法。Override the method if your application needs to implement a meaningful hash code algorithm. ## Examples 下列範例會假設單一字串可以包含多個以空格分隔的電子郵件地址。The following example assumes that a single string can contain multiple email addresses separated by spaces. 它會移除本機的組件和 @ 字元，從每個電子郵件地址，並將產生的網域名稱，以或方法來建立 Punycode 網域名稱。It removes the local part and the @ character from each email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the or method to create a Punycode domain name. 方法再轉換回原始的網域名稱的 Punycode 網域名稱。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/cs/conversion1b.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/vb/conversion1b.vb#3)]

summary.span: Decodes one or more domain name labels encoded according to the IDNA standard to a string of Unicode characters.

span.span: Decodes one or more domain name labels encoded according to the IDNA standard to a string of Unicode characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需網域名稱、 標籤和標籤分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱備註方法。For more information about domain names, labels, and label separators, see the remarks for the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換的陣列國際化網域名稱，為 Punycode。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode. 方法再轉換回原始的網域名稱的 Punycode 網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. MemberSignature.Value: public bool UseStd3AsciiRules { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseStd3AsciiRules
Public Property UseStd3AsciiRules As Boolean
public: property bool UseStd3AsciiRules { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseStd3AsciiRules : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether standard or relaxed naming conventions are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether standard or relaxed naming conventions are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

value.span: 如果作業; 中使用的標準命名慣例否則， 。

span.span: if standard naming conventions are used in operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遵循標準命名規則的網域名稱包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍中的字元的特定子集。Domain names that follow standard naming rules consist of a specific subset of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 字元是字母 A 到 Z、 0 到 9 的數字、 連字號 （-） 字元 (U + 002D)，以及句號 （.） 字元。The characters are the letters A through Z, the digits 0 through 9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character. 字元的大小寫並不重要。The case of the characters is not significant. 比較不嚴謹的命名慣例允許使用更廣泛範圍的 ASCII 字元，包括空格字元 (U + 0020)、 驚嘆號字元 (U + 0021)，和上方橫線字元 (U + 005F)。Relaxed naming conventions allow the use of a broader range of ASCII characters, including the space character (U+0020), the exclamation point character (U+0021), and the underbar character (U+005F). 如果是`true`，標準的字元可出現在所傳回的標籤方法。If is `true`, only standard characters can appear in a label returned by the method. 根據預設，值屬性是`false`，並展開的 ASCII 字元子集允許在標籤中。By default, the value of the property is `false`, and an expanded subset of ASCII characters is permitted in a label. > [!NOTE] > 類別禁止使用雙位元字元 U + 0000 到 U + 001f 範圍，然後在網域名稱為 U + 007F 標記不論設定為何屬性。The class prohibits the use of the nondisplayable characters U+0000 through U+001F, and U+007F in domain name labels regardless of the setting of the property. 這項限制可降低受到安全性攻擊，例如名稱詐騙的風險。This prohibition reduces the risk of security attacks such as name spoofing. ## Examples 下列範例會產生包含從 U + 0000 到 U + 007F ASCII 範圍中的字元的 Url，並將它們傳遞方法有兩個物件。The following example generates URLs that contain characters in the ASCII range from U+0000 to U+007F and passes them to the method of two objects. 一個物件都有其屬性設定為`true`，和另一個物件已將它設定為`false`。One object has its property set to `true`, and the other object has it set to `false`. 輸出會顯示無效字元時屬性是`true`但有效時，它`false`。The output displays the characters that are invalid when the property is `true` but valid when it is `false`. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.usestd3asciirules/cs/usestd3asciirules1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.usestd3asciirules/vb/usestd3asciirules1.vb#1)]
